SEARCH
Package repository

Interface Repository<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - Entity type
ID - Identifier type
All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicationRepository, CareerCenterStaffRepository, CompanyRepresentativeRepository, InternshipOpportunityRepository, StudentRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
CsvApplicationRepository, CsvCareerCenterStaffRepository, CsvCompanyRepresentativeRepository, CsvInternshipOpportunityRepository, CsvStudentRepository
public interface Repository<T,ID>
Generic repository interface for CRUD operations. Provides a standard contract for data access operations across all entities.

This interface follows the Repository pattern to abstract data persistence and retrieval operations. Implementations should handle CSV file operations transparently.

Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

  • Method Details

    • save

      T save(T entity)
      Saves an entity (creates new or updates existing). If the entity already exists (same ID), it will be updated. Otherwise, a new entity will be created.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to save
      Returns:
      The saved entity

    • findById

      Optional<T> findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the entity if found, empty otherwise

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities.
      Returns:
      List of all entities

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(ID id)
      Deletes an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the entity to delete

    • existsById

      boolean existsById(ID id)
      Checks if an entity exists with the given identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier to check
      Returns:
      true if entity exists, false otherwise

    • count

      long count()
      Counts the total number of entities.
      Returns:
      The total count of entities
